dict.acceptation: 帮助；助手；外援；辅助设备；

sent.orig: We provides Hearing Service, Hearing Aid Service, Hearing Aid Fitting Aid Maintenance and Professional Advices.
sent.trans: 耳灵听力中心-提供听力测验、助听器验配、耳模塑造及助听器维修、及专业建议。

sent.orig: We regard self-aid and mutual aid as aid measures and also as strategic tasks.
sent.trans: 我们不仅要把自救互救视为救护措施，还要当作战略性任务。

sent.orig: Emergency aid, development aid, agricultural aid, economic advice. Billions of dollars worth of it.
sent.trans: 紧急援助，发展援助，农业援助，经济咨询等价值几十亿美元的援助。

sent.orig: Officials say the aid stoppage does not affect humanitarian aid sent to relief agencies.
sent.trans: 官员说，停止援助并不影响送往救援机构的人道救援。

sent.orig: Today, the group provides the Humanitarian Aid humanitarian medical aid in nearly 60 countries.
sent.trans: 今天，这个组织在将近60个国家提供人道主义医学救助。
